overview.en: Rupiah Token is a Indonesian Rupiah Stablecoin that are backed 1:1 with Indonesian Rupiah. You can always redeem 1 IDRT for 1 IDR, giving it a stable price. We are proud to the the first non-USD stablecoin in the world. Rupiah Token (IDRT) is a crypto asset on the Ethereum Blockchain that gives you access to global crypto exchanges and smart contracts.
